sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BUGT0250 ( DPOB_CD , ACC_YR , DEPT_BUSIN_STTMT_ACC_SEIL_NUM , DEPT_CD , BUSIN_CD , ACC_UNT_CD , ACC_UNT_TX_ITEM_CD , SMP_CTNT , CALC_BSS_CTNT , DEPT_BUSIN_EXPNS_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #accYr# , #deptBusinSttmtAccSeilNum# , #deptCd# , #businCd# , #accUntCd# , #accUntTxItemCd# , #smpCtnt# , #calcBssCtnt# , #deptBusinExpnsSum# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BUGT0250 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , ACC_YR=#accYr# , DEPT_BUSIN_STTMT_ACC_SEIL_NUM=#deptBusinSttmtAccSeilNum# , DEPT_CD=#deptCd# , BUSIN_CD=#businCd# , ACC_UNT_CD=#accUntCd# , ACC_UNT_TX_ITEM_CD=#accUntTxItemCd# , SMP_CTNT=#smpCtnt# , CALC_BSS_CTNT=#calcBssCtnt# , DEPT_BUSIN_EXPNS_SUM=#deptBusinExpnsSum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND ACC_YR=#accYr# AND DEPT_BUSIN_STTMT_ACC_SEIL_NUM=#deptBusinSttmtAccSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BUGT0250 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND ACC_YR=#accYr# AND DEPT_BUSIN_STTMT_ACC_SEIL_NUM=#deptBusinSttmtAccSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , ACC_YR , DEPT_BUSIN_STTMT_ACC_SEIL_NUM , DEPT_CD , BUSIN_CD , ACC_UNT_CD , ACC_UNT_TX_ITEM_CD , SMP_CTNT , CALC_BSS_CTNT , DEPT_BUSIN_EXPNS_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BUGT0250 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND ACC_YR=#accYr# AND DEPT_BUSIN_STTMT_ACC_SEIL_NUM=#deptBusinSttmtAccSeilNum#
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BUGT0250 WHERE 1=1
